drive-path.description: Mount point or folder to monitor
drive-path.tooltip: Select the mounted drive or folder you want to monitor

update-interval.tooltip: How often to update the disk space information (in seconds)

show-percentage.tooltip: Display the percentage next to the available space

percentage-type.tooltip: Choose whether to show used or free percentage

show-drive-name.tooltip: Display the drive name before the free space

custom-label.tooltip: Set a custom label that overrides the drive name. Leave empty to use drive name if enabled above.

show-free-text.tooltip: Display the word 'free' after the available space

low-space-warning-enabled.tooltip: Change text color when available space is below threshold

low-space-threshold.tooltip: Warning color will be applied when available space is below this percentage

low-space-color.tooltip: Color to display when available space is below threshold

open-file-manager-on-click.tooltip: When enabled, clicking the applet opens the file manager to the monitored folder. When disabled, clicking opens settings.
